about_the_game:
Embark on an extraordinary journey through a mystical realm where warlocks and magic reign supreme. Introducing "Warlocks Deeds," a superbly crafted medieval survival sandbox voxel game that will transport you to a world of enchantment and adventure!

In Warlocks Deeds, you'll step into the shoes of a budding warlock, ready to unravel the secrets of the magical arts and forge your path in a vast and immersive voxel-based universe.

Craft your own destiny as you gather resources, build magnificent structures, and harness the elements to your advantage. Create awe-inspiring potions that can reshape the very fabric of reality and unravel the mysteries of long-lost magical runes.

But beware, fellow warlock, for survival in this untamed realm is no easy feat. Navigate treacherous dungeons teeming with dangerous creatures, contend with rival sorcerers vying for dominance, and face the perils of a dynamic day-night cycle that brings its own challenges and surprises.

In the mystical realm of "Warlocks Deeds," the boundaries of magic and technology blur, allowing warlocks to traverse to different dimensions where advanced technologies exist. Through ancient portals your character can embark on extraordinary journeys to explore realms where science and technology thrive.

Experience points (XP) are earned by engaging in various activities, such as defeating enemies, completing quests, or growing crops. As you accumulate XP, you gradually progress through levels, unlocking new skill points, potions, and abilities. Levelling up also grants you access to more challenging quests, areas, and encounters, ensuring a sense of continuous growth and exploration.

The levelling system in Warlocks Deeds emphasizes the sense of progression and personalization, allowing you to shape your warlocks abilities and playstyle according to your preferences.

content_descriptors.notes: Unrealistic Mild cartoon violence, hitting chickens and fantacy creatures with various items including bows and axes.

name: Warlocks Deeds

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 3.0Ghz or faster multi core.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: At least 4 gig, OpenGL 3.3, GeForce 8800, Radeon HD 4200. Intel cards are not recomended but if you do use them then please reduce your draw distance to 15 chunks.
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: *The game will perform better the more cores you have. Whilst the game only required 300Mb to be installed it will require allot more space as it builds its maps. 2GB is quoted as being the average amount a completed map would take.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Embark on an extraordinary journey through a mystical realm where warlocks and magic reign supreme. Introducing "Warlocks Deeds," a superbly crafted medieval survival sandbox voxel game that will transport you to a world of enchantment and adventure!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Hungarian, Japanese, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian
